fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Spin2Win- (Night) Target a player, confusing them. This will inflict one of the following effects at random:
-Nothing happens
-If the player used an action that would give feedback, the feedback is wrong (ie wrong investigation, being told their target was missing, etc)
-The player receives a message of something that could have happened, but didn’t (ie attacked and healed)
Wager Management!- (Night) [Cheat] When this ability is used, one of the following effects occurs at random:
-[BUST!] Nothing happens.
-[BAR!] A random non-Cog is hit by a Basic Attack.
-[DUCKS!] A random non-Cog is muted on the next Day.
-[SPIRAL!] A random non-Cog is roleblocked.
-[SEVENS!] A random Cog receives Overprotective Defense for the night.
-[JACKPOT!] A random Cog Cheat Ability from a Cog not in the game is used and targets a random player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-A confused player will not be informed that they were confused.
-Effects from Wager Management cannot be redirected.
-[JACKPOT!] will always hit a valid target for the ability.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: Goal: Pave the way for a C.O.G.S takeover of the Town! (Normal REF goal)
